types.html:
poignée hollandaise f (uncountable)

  1. Dutch reach (technique for opening a motor vehicle door to avoid striking (“dooring”) passing cyclists or other road users by reaching across the body for the door latch with the more distant hand)

See also

[edit]
  • emportiérage
trans: Dutch reach  passing cyclists or other road users by reaching across the body for the door latch with the more distant hand)

title: poignée hollandaise
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /pwa.ɲe ɔ.lɑ̃.dɛz/
